inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

relatedNodes.html: Movies, TV shows, and much more
Watch award-winning Amazon Originals and get free shipping on a variety of products. With the annual plan you pay the equivalent of R$9,92/month (R$119/year). Enjoy!
*After 30 days, Amazon Prime is automatically renewed for R$14,90/month or R$119/year. Cancel anytime. CHECK THE INDICATIVE CLASSIFICATION.
Your favorite channels all in one place

With Prime Video Channels, Prime members can subscribe to the channels they love without long-term commitments, being able to cancel at any time. Try selected channels for 7 days free and watch everything in the same place, wherever you are.
Even more movies, now available to rent—no Prime membership required.
Enjoy from the web or with the Prime Video app on your phone, tablet, or select Smart TVs — on up to 3 devices at once.
Watch offline on the Prime Video app when you download titles to your iPhone, iPad, Tablet, or Android device.
Control data usage while downloading and watching videos on select phones or tablets.
